title: Great place to worship.
review: This church is very nice and has a great history to it. It is a nice place to sit, talk, relax and enjoy the day.

title: precious heritage
review: It was wonderful visit. We found this place very peaceful and had very positive vibes. Very well maintained structure has precious heritage value. The church is very old about 200 years and The Church caretaker was open the Church for us. It was a great sight inside, Amazing gothic architecture and the stained glass windows were simply heavenly! It has huge heritage piano was told its more than 150 years old which is still functional. It was wonderful to look at the Altar Bible published in late 1800's. Very beautiful and peaceful place.

title: CHARMING CHURCH
review: This church is around two decade old structure ,still it is very charming,it on the maa road near kurli,it just oppsite the famous shop of lovely omellete

title: A Beautiful Monument
review: A gothic church standing tall bearing the history of past centuries. The windows and the wall of the church is designed with life events of Jesus Christ. The event of Jesus life is beautifully crafted has improved the charm of the church. A dignitary who visited this church in 1906 from UK , planted a deodar tree which is still bearing the testimony of the authentic church.

title: Stunning stained glass windows
review: A peaceful place in the middle of chaotic mall road. Beautifully decorated with imported stained glass windows, made by a Keralite. The caretaker was kind enough to open the church for us on a weekday, otherwise it's open on all Sundays.

title: A peaceful place in the crowded mussoorie
review: Missouri used to be my favorite place to visit my friends but this time we have visited to this place. And this is one of the best place to sit for a while a peaceful place. Here you can listen your heartbeat and breathing sound.

title: Beautiful small church
review: This is very beautiful small church. Church is one main mall road. This is very old church. One should visit this place.

title: Church
review: It's such a nice e and peaceful place to go to moreover it's located there in downtown ,so I would want to suggest everyone out there to visit this place.

title: Church in heart of Mussoorie
review: The Mussoorie Christ Church is located on the Mall Road. It is a small and pretty church. It is a good place to visit in Mussoorie.

title: A normal old church
review: The only reason it is famous is because it is situated on mall road. Apart from that it's a normal church with old architecture. I liked the church at Shima more.

title: Church on mall road
review: This is a Church on mall road- much closer to Kulri Chowk. 100m  from the Kulri Chowk. We spent time at the Church when it was all lighted for Christmas. There are lot of places to eat around.

title: Go for the fabulous stained glass windows
review: Even though the church is located on a small detour from the crowded Mall road, few people come here. The church is generally locked but on request the caretaker will open it. The stained glass windows have been beautifully restored and the sun rays passing through them give a mesmerising effect. It is generally very peaceful and you can spend time going thru the memorial tablets which present a rich history of bygone era.

title: Just to add up spot
review: This place is just to add up spot while sight seeing.  it is situated on mall road.  It was very peaceful so we liked otherwise there is nothing great here.

title: Good old Church
review: This is a nice old Church near the Mall Road which is in good condition, with its stained glass windows having been restored tastefully.

title: a normal church
review: i dont know what was special in this church. it is a normal as every city has a church. but it is on mall road thats why crowdy.

title: On the mall road
review: There are few churches in Mussoorie. This church is one of them near Library end of mall road. The church was old but still in good condition.

title: Old Church
review: The building of this church seems to be old. It was closed when I reached there. The church is near to the point on Mall road where Camel back road starts.

title: Nice Church
review: Possessing Gothic design and architectural styles,the stained glass windows in the church represent the events in the life of Jesus Christ.The walls and interiors of the church are beautifully decorated to grab attention of visitors.

title: a normal church
review: it is a normal church as every city has church but it is famous because it is on mall road. much crowed church. but you can visit only in 20 minutes.

title: Old and famous church
review: Viewing such old church is always amazing. architecture of church is good one. Can be seen when just hanging around on mall road.

title: Old church
review: Oldest church in the town and easily accessible for tourists. Try hot sweet corn with chilly Powder and lime.

title: The Church......... amidst buildings at Mussorie
review: Visited the Church on a Sunday Morning before the commencement of Mass and keen ly watched the tablets and went around......a well maintained church and people started gathering ...father could not spare much time as the mass was about to begin........shall have to come later to know more about the place of worship but a sizable number of people come to pray...

title: Christ Church, Mussoorie
review: Christ Church is the main attraction in the Mussoorie. The walls and interiors of the church are beautifully decorated to grab attention of visitors.

title: Serene Place
review: Excellent location with silence as your companion. A must for all visitors to Mussorie, take home nostalgia.

title: Not worth it can be avoided if you have shortage of time
review: It is not so appealing, probably local guides have added into the least just to add more points of sight seeing. Visiting to mussorie is adventure water falls and climate. So in view can be avoided and same time can be used at places like kempty fall Lal tibba or in the balcony of your hotel enjoying the weather.

title: Antique and peaceful place
review: if you are fond of seeing old architectural buildings and want to see it in the nature paradise, visit this place. Very peaceful and divine. Must visit place.

title: Nice plAce
review: It was a nice and peaceful place to visit and a great atmoshphere it was my pleasure to visit here I loved this place

title: Old church
review: The church is quite well maintained and has historical importance. Unfortunately we missed the Christmas service. There were others too who missed the same.

title: Beautiful Church
review: One of the most prominent visitors of Christ Church include the Princess of Wales who came here in 1906 and planted a Deodar sapling in the church yard. Today, a beautiful tree stands tall which acts as a memorabilia and is shown to the visitors. Then there is not-to-miss William Hill organ (in the Church itself) which dates back to more than 100 years.

title: Go on A Sunday
review: Excellent visit on a Sunday morning. This was the first church consecrated in Mussoorie in 1828 by Rev Maddock (who ran the Maddock school which is now the Savoy Hotel)

title: serene place
review: This is an extremely peaceful and serene place to spend some time.

title: A must visit place!
review: The church is about two hundred years old and hold trees older than a century. The coloured glasses shine with sunlight and create a beautiful effect. The view from where the church stands is scenic specially at sunset.

title: Beautiful church
review: Ita a very nice & beautiful chruch located at mall road.Its a  nice & perfect example of british architect.Its a must & worth visiting church

title: Mesmerising!
review: I visited the church with some of my friends for a Sunday service! It was one of the best place I had ever visited in Mussoorie! The church as beautiful Gothic Architecture and nearly 200 year old church organ.. The Sunday service too was very serene! We were only 6 people attending the Sunday service.. The church is full of plaques from 19th and 20th century as a memoriam of its worshippers from last two centuries!

title: about church
review: i saw this type of church first time in my life. it is very beautiful and amazing. u can see here the most of the persons

title: The church in Gothic theme
review: This church is an ancient one deemed to be visited by Princess Wales. The deodar plant planted by her is still remaining and this church gives an amazing peaceful environment.

title: Well maintained
review: Unexpected but the church is quite well maintained . Beautiful small  church located in Mall road with one of the oldest bible and William hill organ

title: Shimla view
review: The church is the replica of the Christ Church Shimla. The atmosphere and the surroundings is full of peace and tranquility

title: nice view
review: nice place for photos with an amazing view, next visit we will be spending more time there to learn more of the facility and surrounds

title: church have special charm of mall
review: The mall road of musoorie have become so neat and beautifull that this time I am suprised to see the cleanliness of whole mall area is tremendous specal feature of wifi is added experience churh on the mall road is so beautifull that one can not stop himself  for visiting it.

title: Takes you back in time
review: Takes you back in time.....so clean, quaint and a prayerful atmosphere. A walk up the hill from library side...

title: nice
review: Nice church located on thye hill top has awesome views of dehradun valley. We visited this church and wow what beauty

title: HISTORICAL CHURCHES
review: Historical Churches While holidaying in Mussoorie, I miss on the famous historical churches.i alwyas miss that place.

title: beautiful
review: i like church alot so decided to visit this and was not left dissapointed... very calm and peaceful..

title: Beautiful small church
review: Very nice and peaceful place. Though the Church is quite small but is really very beautiful.Its located in Mall road

title: What A Heritage !
review: Beautiful small church”

title: Interesting
review: Interesting church with a nice history. The church has an old organ which is really old but is badly maintained.

title: A Walk into the Historical Era
review: Christ Church is located above Mall road and it has the charm of bygone era. The Gothic architecture is evident. The church is well maintained and very peaceful. The most impressive thing about the church is one of the oldest Bible and the heavy organ which occupies an entire room. Though the organ doesn't function, still it is magnificent.

title: Has a rare William Hill organ
review: Simple little quiet church. But we were blown away when we saw the rare William Hill Organ housed inside.

title: nice place
review: nice place..one must visit to this place if you are going to mussorie...Beautiful place ..you have lost of maggi points near to this place..

title: amazing architect
review: this is my one of the fab church in India as a guide i visited most of the places in India to look for the real British architect this church impress me

title: a calm and quite place to pay a visit.
review: this is near landour bazaar, do pay a visit to this place when you are at landour bazaar. the calmness of this place is very relaxing. it is a 100 year old place but very magnificently maintained. the Italian stained glass lends a beautiful aura to this place.

title: Old Monument-Simple Church
review: The church is based in an old monument and looks beautiful at night with the colorful lights around it. Do visit the place if possible.

title: Nicely preserved
review: Sadly the organ doesn't work, but the inside is lovely and there are many old plaques on the wall remembering the British who died in this beautiful hill station.

title: Good Place
review: I have never been to a church before. This was my first step inside a church. How clean and silent it was. Do pay a visit to church for a some silent moment to thank God.

title: Nice church
review: It's a nice quiet church with a good calm anD peaceful ambience. If you have time, it's a good place to visit.

title: Historic!
review: The Christ Church is located just above the Mall Road. A historic building dating back to the nineteenth century. It is an important visit for anyone interested in the architecture of an era gone by...

title: Incredible Piano Room
review: Very beautiful newly restored Church.

title: Not the one in the picture
review: We went there only to find out it is closed and been like that for a long time. Nothing special. Would have loved to check it out from the inside.

title: Good for Photo Fanatic & Wanderer
review: Wrapped in an old world charm and still located on the bustling Library Road, Christ Church was built in the year 1836 for the increasing British community in that area. Said to be the oldest church in the entire Himalayan range, its major attraction is the pre-Raphaelite glass windows which represent the life of Jesus Christ in a very effective way. With its Gothic style architecture and colonial feel, this church takes you to the vintage era.

title: in one word fabulous
review: a lovely and nice monument which has been restored with elegance . they have nice glass paintings . though a drawback it is open only on sundays .the place is full of visitors , oone should plan a trip if he is going to mussorie

title: Relic of the Raj
review: For most visitors, this heritage structure will at most be just a photo op. That it still exists is a minor miracle. If you take the time to enter the grounds and read the historical plaque, you will be rewarded with an interesting account of the church’s past. It is still a working centre of Christian faith and a place of worship that has a special connection to British and now modern India.

title: historic place, open on sunday
review: it is old church, well maintained, beautiful piano, nice lovely place, however it is too cramped, open on Sunday only,

title: nice church
review: wanted my kids to see a church and it was a good experience to visit this place. This church is historical and has been maintained nicely. It has preserved beautiful paintings and very old Piano (some 150 yrs old).

title: simple like all old churches..
review: situated on the mall you would definitely come across the old building...not many people visit..clean maintained but nothing to get attracted as a heritage property specially

title: Nothing much to see here
review: Small church. Right at the entrance of the mall road from library end. Too cramped around here to even view the entire building.

title: Good
review: Awesome church

title: queen of hills-mussoorie
review: Mussoorie is around 35 km from .... DehraDun. This is also calle...d the queen of hills. It ....is a beautiful small city which is famous for GunHill .....(which can be reached by roap way from Mussoorie), ....Company Garden. There is also a very famous IAS .... Academy at Mussoorie. The famous .... Kempty fall is very.... ... close to Mussoorie. There is also famous places ... like Dhanaulti .... nearby. There are lot of .... trekking options ... also available around .... Mussoorie.

title: Spectacular in being mussorie
review: By going in the mussorie i saw a 2nd Heaven on the earth. because not for its beauty but when we look from the top  to Dehra Doon  it looks like that thousand of candle lightening in the river

title: Beautiful church
review: Very cute and old church.. Has lovely stain glass paintings inside..it makes for a nice place to c while walking around mall road..

title: What a Heritage!
review: This church is worth a visit with its old stain glasses, you feel sad that it is not maintained properly. The old bible of 19 th century and the benches, photos etc are worth  seeing. The parish hall  (such a lovely house) is taken over by someone it seems

title: Mussoorie -The city
review: All the 5 of us who visited have fallen for the city.ITS Heaven on Earth,the quaint city up on the hills far far away from the maddening crowd and miles of traffic its pure bliss.The travelling clouds reaching out to u playing hide and seek one minute there the next gone the clear sky the stars in the night the expanse of the sky which is lost in the city sky-rise buildings is mesmerising the hills with crisp air and natural beauty beckon u .My choice always

title: Holy Christ!
review: They say that the truck drivers look up at this church's peak when they first see it coming up from Dehradoon and pray for safe journey.... the church goes beyond religion and is an article of faith for many of many religions... it is beautiful... must visit it, folks

title: good view from outside  mostly crowded by foriegners
review: its ok for one time go if you are non christian to understdand traditional history of mussorie , nothing extraordinary but still

title: A must see
review: A great visit.The church is very old about 150 years and is open only for Sunday masses.The caretaker was king enough to open the church for us.It was a great sight inside.It has an organ which is still functional and is 150 years old.

title: Good visit
review: Lovely church. The caretaker informed that the church was renovated last year. The action was success. The church interiors looked new. It is opened only on Sunday. It was wonderful to look at the altar bible published in late 1800's.

title: Peace, that's what it is meant for
review: while our excursion to lal tibba, we went to Mussourie Christ Church. We found this place very peaceful and had very positive vibes. Very well maintained structure has precious heritage value.

title: Nothing special
review: Except for the stained glass paintings that have been done recently, there is nothing very great in terms of architecture. In fact the Church remains closed except for Sunday's. We were lucky to find the caretaker who let us in.

title: Great Building spectacular sight
review: Must visit when you are mussouriee. Your trip is incomplete if y ou haven't been to this great monument built by British

title: Mussoorie
review: Very well restored ! The walk to the church is also beautiful in the midst of Pine trees

title: nice and peaceful area...we enjoyed a lot there...every one was enjoying..
review: lovely...for a moment we were thinking that ye hum kaha aa gaye yaar...really superb....i would suggest to everyone to go there n see what is the beauty called ???????

title: Antique and historic church
review: As we went on sunday we were lucky to attend the mass

title: good place
review: good place to see i recmond once you must visit to musoorie

title: Awesome architecture!
review: Amazing gothic architecture and the stained glass windows were simply heavenly! There's also the main altar,which is high and shows the crucifiction of Jesus christ.

title: Locked gate
review: It's always locked. You might feel cheated after the climb. Nice to look at from outside, though. The Tibetan market on the down slope of the ramp is avoidable, so turn back the way you went up.

title: The queen of hills!
review: A good place amidst the hills and mountains. Beautiful locations and awesome climate  all contributes to the beauty of the city.
